text.title: Deals for Developers
text.intro: Explore the contributions that Cambridge candidates have received from development firms and their affiliated contributors

legend.edgeLabel: Thicker, darker edges indicate a larger number of donations contributed by a single developer to a candidate
legend.colorLabel:
Blue = Developer
Bright Red = Official currently in office
Dark Red = Official not currently in office
legend.nodeLabel: Larger circles indicate a larger number of developer donations received or given
